column4: hmmm...  I got "tar: Cowardly refusing to create an empty archive"  ...  What did I do wrong?
you need to specify what you want to be archived before pointing to the target.tar.gz
have a look at gnome-do or kupfer if you want to launch stuff but no panel
Yeah, I'm trying to see if I like Gnome-do, AWN, Cairo dock, or kupfer the best.
